content.raw:
Two overall comments:

1.  Minor style question - Should we always add brackets around loops/condtionals, even if they are one-line?  I typically prefer that \(it makes editing easier\).  Most of sdformat is that way, though not all of it.  We don’t have to bikeshed it here, I’m just bringing it up briefly.
2. It seems like the `Load` method \(in Light and elsewhere\) really wants to be a protected or private method.  The one reason it can't be is because of `loadUniqueRepeated`.  As a longer-term measure, maybe we could make all of the classes that want to use that derive from some base-class, and then make `loadUniqueRepeated` a method or friend of that class?  Again, we don't have to fix that here, just bringing it up as food for thought.
